ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Shoulders
ygData.msgSnippet: Fortunately no imbued gems are required for Enchanted Elven Plate and it is not deity restricted.  I have 3 imbued star rose quartz s on E ci, but have yet to
ygData.messageBody:
Fortunately no imbued gems are required for Enchanted Elven Plate and it is
not deity restricted. I have 3 imbued star rose quartz's on E'ci, but have
yet to find a smith who could make the human armor for me.

Kit

-----Original Message-----
From: Daniel Sniderman [mailto:fuzzbone@...]
Sent: Tuesday, 29 May, 2001 10:33 AM
To: eqbards@yahoogroups.com
Subject: RE: [eqbards] Shoulders


A guildie of mine does cultural smithing - but you have to have a gem
imbrued by a cleric of your god. I have YET to find an Erolissi Marr cleric
on all of Xegony server...

Slyde

-----Original Message-----
From: Kimes, Dean W. [mailto:dean_kimes@...]
Sent: Tuesday, May 29, 2001 11:22 AM
To: 'eqbards@yahoogroups.com'
Subject: RE: [eqbards] Shoulders


It's a smithed item. The recipe was fixed in a recent patch so they have
only been possible for about 3 weeks. Before the blue diamond requirement
was dropped no one was even trying to smith Enchanted Elven Plate.

Kit
